changeSet.author: muradtcen
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE categories ( id SERIAL, name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, sort INT NOT NULL, active BOOLEAN NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP(0) WITHOUT TIME ZONE NOT NULL, updated_at TIMESTAMP(0) WITHOUT TIME ZONE DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(id));

changeSet.author: muradtcen
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE works ( id SERIAL, author_id INT NOT NULL, name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, description TEXT DEFAULT NULL, image_path VARCHAR(255) NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP(0) WITHOUT TIME ZONE NOT NULL, updated_at TIMESTAMP(0) WITHOUT TIME ZONE DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(id));

changeSet.author: muradtcen
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE categories_works ( work_id INT NOT NULL, category_id INT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(work_id, category_id));

changeSet.author: muradtcen
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE authors ( id SERIAL, name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, article TEXT DEFAULT NULL, photo_path VARCHAR(255) DEFAULT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP(0) WITHOUT TIME ZONE NOT NULL, updated_at TIMESTAMP(0) WITHOUT TIME ZONE DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(id))

changeSet.author: muradtcen
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE files ( id SERIAL, path VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP(0) WITHOUT TIME ZONE NOT NULL, updated_at TIMESTAMP(0) WITHOUT TIME ZONE DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(id))

changeSet.author: muradtcen
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE file_author ( author_id INT NOT NULL REFERENCES authors (id), file_id INT NOT NULL REFERENCES files (id), PRIMARY KEY(author_id, file_id))

changeSet.author: muradtcen
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE file_work ( work_id INT NOT NULL REFERENCES works (id), file_id INT NOT NULL REFERENCES files (id), PRIMARY KEY(work_id, file_id))
